title: Bounded generics are not properly mapped to OpenApi schema
body:
### Describe the bug

I have encounter on strange behavior when using generic rest service resource interfaces with bounded generic types.

If the following rest resource interface with bounded generic is introduced:

```java
public interface FruitResource<DTO extends Fruit> {
    @GET
    DTO get();
}

public abstract class Fruit extends Serializable {
    Long id;
}
```

With following Fruit implementations: 

```java
public class Apple extends Fruit {
    String name;
    String desc;
}
public class Banana extends Fruit {
    String origin;
}
public class Mango extends Fruit {
    String type;
}
```

And resource IF/implementations:

```java
public interface AppleResource extends FruitResource<Apple> {
}

@Path("/rest/apple")
@Tag(name = "AppleResource")
public class AppleResourceImpl extends FruitResourceImpl<Apple> implements AppleResource {
}

public interface BananaResource extends FruitResource<Banana> {
    @PUT
    @Path("{id}")
    void update(@PathParam("id") Long id, Banana dto);
}

@Path("/rest/banana")
@Tag(name = "BananaResource")
public class BananaResourceImpl extends FruitResourceImpl<Banana> implements BananaResource {
    @Override
    public void update(Long id, Banana dto) {
    }
}

public interface MangoResource extends FruitResource<Mango> {
}

@Path("/rest/mango")
@Tag(name = "MangoResource")
public class MangoResourceImpl extends FruitResourceImpl<Mango> implements MangoResource {
}
```

Fruit classes are not mapped correctly in generated OpenApi schema for FruitResource.get() methods (random Fruit class is mapped to all resources) . 

If FruitResource interface is modified that its DTO generic is bounded by Serializable, Serializable is mapped as schema for all FruitResource.get() methods. 

When bounding is removed:

```java
public interface FruitResource<DTO> {
    @GET
    DTO get();
}
```

implementations of Fruit classes are mapped correctly.

### Expected behavior

OpenApi schema:

```
---
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Fruit Market
  version: 1.0.39-SNAPSHOT
tags:
- name: AppleResource
- name: BananaResource
- name: MangoResource
paths:
  /rest/apple:
    get:
      tags:
      - AppleResource
      operationId: AppleResourceImpl_get
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Apple'
  /rest/banana:
    get:
      tags:
      - BananaResource
      operationId: BananaResourceImpl_get
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Banana'
  /rest/mango:
    get:
      tags:
      - MangoResource
      operationId: MangoResourceImpl_get
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Mango'
components:
  schemas:
    Apple:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        name:
          type: string
        desc:
          type: string
    Banana:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        origin:
          type: string
    Fruit:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
    Mango:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        type:
          type: string
```

### Actual behavior

OpenApi schema:

```
---
openapi: 3.0.3
info:
  title: Fruit Market
  version: 1.0.39-SNAPSHOT
tags:
- name: AppleResource
- name: BananaResource
- name: MangoResource
paths:
  /rest/apple:
    get:
      tags:
      - AppleResource
      operationId: AppleResourceImpl_get
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Mango'
  /rest/banana:
    get:
      tags:
      - BananaResource
      operationId: BananaResourceImpl_get
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Mango'
  /rest/mango:
    get:
      tags:
      - MangoResource
      operationId: MangoResourceImpl_get
      responses:
        "200":
          description: OK
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Mango'
components:
  schemas:
    Apple:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        name:
          type: string
        desc:
          type: string
    Banana:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        origin:
          type: string
    Fruit:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
    Mango:
      type: object
      properties:
        id:
          format: int64
          type: integer
        type:
          type: string
```
